Title: Customer research
Description: Conduct an additional customer research to validate your ideas and to reduce inconsistencies in your product.

Title: Refactoring
Description: Make your code cleaner and reduce your tech debt. But remember, developer can't perform any tasks while refactoring!

Title: New creatives
Description: Market rejects your product entirely? Make more new creatives to spread!

Title: Product overhaul
Description: Tough times demands tough decisions. Despite all the efforts your product doesn't perform well enough. Let's rebuild it from scratch!
